title: The EASIEST Way to Get 100s of Book Reviews on Amazon KDP (Updated Tutorial)

tactics.name: arc_reviews
tactics.description: Get reviews by offering free advanced reader copies (ARCs) in exchange for honest feedback.
steps: Sign up for review platforms like Book Bounty
Review other authors' books to earn points
Use accumulated points to request reviews for your book
caveats: Ensure platform complies with KDP guidelines to avoid review swapping violations
source_quotes: Book Bounty and these services prevents you from review swapping

tactics.name: Book Bounty Pre-Launch Strategy
tactics.description: Use Book Bounty to collect review points before publishing to accelerate post-launch reviews
steps: Sign up for Book Bounty before publishing
Review other books to collect points
Use accumulated points for post-launch reviews
caveats: Service may fail to deliver reviews if guidelines change
source_quotes: aim to get to 100 reviews per book before you move on
